Surabhi Bhargava


Hello! Thanks for stopping by!

I am a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Adobe working on building Machine Learning features for enabling document intelligence. I work with computer vision and natural language processing techniques to decompose and understand the structure of PDF documents. Most recently, I have been working on creating datasets and building models for decomposing the structure of tables successfully.

Prior to joining Adobe, I completed my Master's degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Machine Learning from Columbia University and my undergraduate degree in Electronics and Electrical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Guwahati, India.

I am deeply passionate about research in my field. Please refer to the research section for more details.
